quote: Our dead are never dead to us, until we have forgotten them.
author: George Eliot

quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Because death is inevitable, all the more reason to live supreme and sublime.
author: Paracelsus

quote: In the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Death smiles at us all; all we can do is smile back.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: To live in hearts we leave behind is not to die.
author: Thomas Campbell

quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life.
author: Mark Twain

quote: No one really knows why they are alive until they know what they’d die for.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Death is the dropping of the flower that the fruit may swell.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: We cannot escape death, but we can escape the fear of it.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Death is nothing else but going home to God.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: No man knows till he has suffered from the night how sweet and dear to his heart and eye the morning can be.
author: Anne Bradstreet

quote: Our death is not an end if we can live on in our children and the younger generation.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Death ends a life, not a relationship.
author: Jack Lemmon

quote: Death is just life’s next big adventure.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: A man who won’t die for something is not fit to live.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: He who is not busy being born is busy dying.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Death is the wish of some, the relief of many, and the end of all.
author: Seneca

quote: To die will be an awfully big adventure.
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: Better to die on your feet than live on your knees.
author: Emiliano Zapata

quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
author: Buddha

quote: The art of dying well is under-appreciated.
author: Seneca

quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It’s the transition that’s troublesome.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Death is not extinguishing the light; it is putting out the lamp because the dawn has come.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I’m not afraid of death; I just don’t want to be there when it happens.
author: Woody Allen

quote: All that lives must die, passing through nature to eternity.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Death is inevitable—when a man has done what he considers to be his duty to his people and his country, he toils his mother.
author: Nehru

quote: The unwillingness to face one’s own mortality is the mother of cruelty.
author: Sophocles

quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The goal isn’t to live forever, the goal is to create something that will.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Our bones don't lie; remember who you are.
author: Mayan Proverb

quote: Death is but the next great adventure.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so life well used brings happy death.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Mortality reminds us to cherish each breath.
author: Rumi

quote: The only certain thing about life is its ending.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Nature gave us one tongue and two ears so we could hear twice as much as we speak.
author: Epictetus

quote: Death is the last enemy; once we’ve got past that I think everything will be all right.
author: Alice Thomas Ellis

quote: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Better to die of passion than of boredom.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Life is eternal, and love is immortal, and death is only a horizon; and a horizon is nothing save the limit of our sight.
author: Rossiter Worthington Raymond

quote: Death is the liberation of the soul into a higher dimension.
author: Plato

quote: We die containing a richness of lovers and tribes, tastes we have swallowed, bodies we have plunged into and swum up as if rivers of wisdom, characters we have climbed into as if trees, fears we have hidden in as if caves.
author: Michael Ondaatje

quote: Do not despise death, but welcome it for it is the road to eternity.
author: Socrates

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Death is a challenge. It tells us not to waste time.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: The shell must break, that the bird may fly.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: Because one believes in oneself, one doesn't try to convince others. Because one is content with oneself, one doesn't need others' approval. Because one accepts oneself, the whole world accepts him or her.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Even death is not terrible: it is the flight of the soul from fetters.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Death is more universal than life; everyone dies but not everyone lives.
author: Andrew Sachs

quote: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Life, thus examined, is not gray, but black and white.
author: Dag Hammarskjöld

quote: Death ends a life, but it does not end a relationship.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: Think not those faithful who praise all thy words and actions; but those who kindly reprove thy faults.
author: Socrates

quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.
author: Albert Pike

quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated and inglorious is to die daily.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: A well-spent life is the only passport to heaven.
author: Pope Leo I

quote: Do not go gentle into that good night. Rage, rage against the dying of the light.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
author: Seneca

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Living well is the best revenge.
author: George Herbert

quote: If life must not be taken too seriously, then so neither must death.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: It’s not that I’m afraid to die, I just don’t want to be there when it happens.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Only the hand that erases can write the true thing.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Death is the golden key that opens the palace of eternity.
author: John Milton

quote: Live fully while you’re alive, and laugh loudly while you laugh.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: We all die. The goal isn’t to live forever, the goal is to create something that will.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Cherish your human connections – your relationships with friends and family.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Do not act as if you were going to live ten thousand years. Death hangs over you.
author: Marcus Aurelius
